title: OUT OF YARDAGE: With the nightmare of his actions coming back to haunt him, this was Rob Ford’s chance...

attachments.displayName:
OUT OF YARDAGE: With the nightmare of his actions coming back to haunt him, this was Rob Ford’s chance to finally come clean; likely his last good opportunity to throw himself on the mercy of this city, admit he has a problem and bow out for help.

That would have been smart. That would have been admirable. But Ford is neither, our Michele Mandel says. Do you agree? http://ow.ly/qnHXf

object.content:
